hasDitaContent.@value: Hydrochlorothiazide is predicted to cause hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with zuclopenthixol. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Hydrochlorothiazide   is predicted to   cause   hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with   zuclopenthixol .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .
